overview: Rob Steele has the hots for his new boss Jake Hammer, but Jake is having an office romance with Chaz Carlton. Chaz is getting his ass pounded regularly by Jacke during office hours. Elsewhere, Bruce Hill and Patrick Ives are carrying on in the warehouse. Rob calls his friend Alex at home for advice as to what to do about Jake. Alex, who is distracted by Duncan Mills giving him head, nevertheless tells Rob to come clean about his secret lust. Rob gets up the nerve to go to Jake's office and discovers that Jake is hot and ready to ride his rump!
title: My Secret Lust
